sentences.en: A binder is necessary for strand integrity.
sentences.cn: 粘结剂对纤维的集束性能是必需的.

sentences.en: Aluminum profiles on the open trench, glass installation demolition no binder . 4.
sentences.cn: 铝合金的型材上开设沟槽, 玻璃的安装拆卸也不用粘结剂.

sentences.en: Briquette binder is a key technology in the area of briquette production.
sentences.cn: 型煤粘结剂是型煤生产的关键技术.

sentences.en: Conventional stabilizers are added to the binder system as will be discussed below.
sentences.cn: 如下面将要讲的,粘合剂系统中加入惯用的安定剂.

sentences.en: Mr. Quincy is known to be a spell binder.
Rabbi Binder's hand flicked out at Ozzie's cheek.
sentences.cn: 拉比的手突然挥向奥齐的面颊.

sentences.en: Short for binder utility, an operating - system program that performs binding.
sentences.cn: 联编实用程序的简称, 是一种能够实现联接和编辑的操作系统 级 的程序.

sentences.en: Tar is a binder for gravel in paving.
sentences.cn: 在铺路时柏油用来粘结砾石.

sentences.en: The cloth flower snaps on with a special binder.
sentences.cn: 这布花是用一种特殊的粘合剂固定住的.

sentences.en: The dextrin was used as pore - making agent and binder.
sentences.cn: 以糊精作为造孔剂及粘结剂,制备出了多孔碳化硅陶瓷.

sentences.en: The dynamic call site binder that participates in the DynamicMetaObject binding protocol.
sentences.cn: 表示动态绑定和参与动态绑定的对象的绑定逻辑.

sentences.en: The final operation in propellant manufacture is the curing of the binder.
sentences.cn: 制造推进剂的最后操作是粘合剂的固化.

sentences.en: The phosphate also acts as a binder.
sentences.cn: 磷矿还起胶结剂的作用.

sentences.en: The preferred compositions are the highly nitroplasticized nitrocellulose binder compositions.
sentences.cn: 较好的配方是那些高硝基增塑的硝化棉粘合剂配方.
